CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplified compose box
CurrentVersion.description: A simplified compose box UI will make it easier to create and send messages. Edit your message, insert an emoji or call Copilot right from the compose box, or click on the plus button to choose from the extended menu of actions. Note: This is for the new Teams experience only.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplified compose box
OldVersion.description: A simplified compose box UI will make it easier to create and send messages. Edit your message, insert an emoji or call Copilot right from the compose box, or click on the plus button to choose from the extended menu of actions. Note: This is for the new Teams experience only.

CurrentVersion.title: Universal Print: Integration with macOS
CurrentVersion.description: ,The native integration of Universal Print with macOS will empower macOS users to print from any app, just like Windows users can today. Whether people are on Windows or macOS, they have a seamless, no learning curve print-experience. Organizations benefit from the simplicity of a single print-solution for all users.

OldVersion.title: Universal Print: Integration with macOS
OldVersion.description: ,The native integration of Universal Print with macOS will empower macOS users to print from any app, just like Windows users can today. Whether people are on Windows or macOS, they have a seamless, no learning curve print-experience. Organizations benefit from the simplicity of a single print-solution for all users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Admin Center: Deploy and manage Shifts for your frontline teams in the Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will gain the ability to standardize Shifts settings (open shifts, swap shifts requests, offer shifts requests, time off requests and time clock), identify schedule owners, and create scheduling groups uniformly for all frontline teams at the tenant level.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Admin Center: Deploy and manage Shifts for your frontline teams in the Teams Admin Center
OldVersion.description: Admins will gain the ability to standardize Shifts settings (open shifts, swap shifts requests, offer shifts requests, time off requests and time clock), identify schedule owners, and create scheduling groups uniformly for all frontline teams at the tenant level.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Deploy your frontline operational hierarchy in the Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description:
Admins
will be able to set up their frontline operational hierarchy to map their
organization’s structure of frontline teams/locations to a hierarchy in the
Teams Admin Center. Admins can also define attributes for their teams that
range from department information to brand information. The operational
hierarchy coupled with this added metadata will enable numerous frontline apps
and experiences in the future like task publishing and additional frontline
capabilities that are coming soon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Customize a Viva Pulse end date
CurrentVersion.description: Customize your Viva Pulse end date when sending a pulse.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Customize a Viva Pulse end date
OldVersion.description: Customize your Viva Pulse end date when sending a pulse.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: ,With Copilot in Viva Goals, user will be able to leverage AI in creating goals, summaries, and making updates in Viva Goals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Copilot
OldVersion.description: With Copilot in Viva Goals, user will be able to leverage AI in creating goals, summaries, and making updates in Viva Goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows Message Extension: New Default Actions
CurrentVersion.description: The Microsoft Teams Workflows Message Extension will include new default actions to assist user collaboration. These actions will simplify collaboration within a conversation by enabling users to kick off common workflows and post adaptive cards to conversations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows Message Extension: New Default Actions
OldVersion.description: The Microsoft Teams Workflows Message Extension will include new default actions to assist user collaboration. These actions will simplify collaboration within a conversation by enabling users to kick off common workflows and post adaptive cards to conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join Teams work meetings from Microsoft Teams (free) and vice versa
CurrentVersion.description:
This
feature enables Microsoft Teams (free) users, those using a personal Microsoft
Account, to directly join Teams for work meetings from within the client and
stay connected even after the meeting has ended. This feature similarly also
enables Microsoft Teams (work or school) users to join the Microsoft Teams
(free) meetings directly from within the client.  These users are no longer prompted to join
via a browser and treated as meeting guests (anonymous).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join Teams work meetings from Microsoft Teams (free) and vice versa
OldVersion.description:
This
feature enables Microsoft Teams (free) users, those using a personal Microsoft
Account, to directly join Teams for work meetings from within the client and
stay connected even after the meeting has ended. This feature similarly also
enables Microsoft Teams (work or school) users to join the Microsoft Teams
(free) meetings directly from within the client.  These users are no longer prompted to join
via a browser and treated as meeting guests (anonymous).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting Options Categorization
CurrentVersion.description:
We
are introducing grouping within Meeting Options to improve organizers’ and
co-organizers’ ease of understanding selections.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting Options Categorization
OldVersion.description:
We
are introducing grouping within Meeting Options to improve organizers’ and
co-organizers’ ease of understanding selections.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Scheduling Assistant settings moving to the toolbar
CurrentVersion.description: We are moving the settings for the Scheduling assistant to the toolbar to reduce clicks and a more seamless scheduling experience. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked Launched.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Scheduling Assistant settings moving to the toolbar
OldVersion.description: We are moving the settings for the Scheduling assistant to the toolbar to reduce clicks and a more seamless scheduling experience. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked Launched.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy deletion enhancement
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this update,
admins with appropriate permissions can delete all associated alerts, cases,
and users in scope when deleting a policy to help quickly reset and remove
inactive policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various
signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as
IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management
enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies,
governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design,
users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit
logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy deletion enhancement
OldVersion.description:
,With this update,
admins with appropriate permissions can delete all associated alerts, cases,
and users in scope when deleting a policy to help quickly reset and remove
inactive policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various
signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as
IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management
enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies,
governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design,
users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit
logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy deletion enhancement
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, admins with appropriate permissions can delete all associated alerts, cases, and users in scope when deleting a policy to help quickly reset and remove inactive policies.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy deletion enhancement
OldVersion.description:
With this update, admins with appropriate permissions can delete all associated alerts, cases, and users in scope when deleting a policy to help quickly reset and remove inactive policies.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
OldVersion.description: Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom backgrounds for announcement posts in channels (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Teams users will be able to create engaging custom backgrounds for channel announcements in just a few clicks. For Teams Premium, users will have additional access to DALL-E, a text to image generator, to generate images for their backgrounds.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom backgrounds for announcement posts in channels (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Teams users will be able to create engaging custom backgrounds for channel announcements in just a few clicks. For Teams Premium, users will have additional access to DALL-E, a text to image generator, to generate images for their backgrounds.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Admins can provide intent while submitting
CurrentVersion.description: Admins submitting to Microsoft can convey whether they are submitting for a second opinion or they are submitting to convey their confirmation of clean or malicious verdict.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Admins can provide intent while submitting
OldVersion.description: Admins submitting to Microsoft can convey whether they are submitting for a second opinion or they are submitting to convey their confirmation of clean or malicious verdict.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Last used date inside Tenant Allow Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Tenant allow block list domains & addresses, URL, and file entries will show last used date. This helps admins understand when an entry was last used (either at mailflow or time of click), helping them remove entries which are no longer needed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Last used date inside Tenant Allow Block List
OldVersion.description: Tenant allow block list domains & addresses, URL, and file entries will show last used date. This helps admins understand when an entry was last used (either at mailflow or time of click), helping them remove entries which are no longer needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: High and Low importance
CurrentVersion.description: You can now send email with High or Low importance from Outlook for iOS.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: High and Low importance
OldVersion.description: You can now send email with High or Low importance from Outlook for iOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description:
Intelligent recap will support meetings with
only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only
transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that
users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name
mentions.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Custom shapes in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 2 license will be able to use third-party custom shapes to create diagrams in Visio for the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Edit legacy .vsd files in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to edit legacy .vsd files in Visio for the web by creating an exact copy (except macros) and saving it in the latest .vsdx format.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio flyout and settings in Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description:
The Audio and Video
Flyout is designed to make it easier and more efficient for users to manage
their audio and video settings during Teams meetings. Users can easily toggle
features on and off with visual indicators for both audio and video settings,
eliminating the need to navigate deep into the settings menu to make
adjustments.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio flyout and settings in Teams meetings
OldVersion.description:
The Audio and Video
Flyout is designed to make it easier and more efficient for users to manage
their audio and video settings during Teams meetings. Users can easily toggle
features on and off with visual indicators for both audio and video settings,
eliminating the need to navigate deep into the settings menu to make
adjustments.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: AI hub in Microsoft Purview
CurrentVersion.description: ,The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts - both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: AI hub in Microsoft Purview
OldVersion.description: ,The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts - both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control your mic state during meetings from Windows taskbar available in the new Teams on Windows
CurrentVersion.description:
This
feature, available in the new Teams experience on Windows, enables you to mute
and unmute your audio by clicking the mic icon in Windows taskbar. To control
your mic during the meeting from the taskbar, do the following: select the mic
icon on your taskbar or press Windows logo key + Alt + K to mute or unmute.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control your mic state during meetings from Windows taskbar available in the new Teams on Windows
OldVersion.description:
This
feature, available in the new Teams experience on Windows, enables you to mute
and unmute your audio by clicking the mic icon in Windows taskbar. To control
your mic during the meeting from the taskbar, do the following: select the mic
icon on your taskbar or press Windows logo key + Alt + K to mute or unmute.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Answer insights and enhanced user adoption analytics
CurrentVersion.description: Answer analytics for Microsoft Search provides insights into how editorial content like Bookmarks, Acronyms and Q&A are performing within the organization. Enhanced user analytics provides insights into search adoption across search applications like SharePoint, Microsoft Search for Bing, Microsoft Search for Windows, Microsoft365.com, and now also cover in-app searches from Outlook, Teams and other office applications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Answer insights and enhanced user adoption analytics
OldVersion.description: Answer analytics for Microsoft Search provides insights into how editorial content like Bookmarks, Acronyms and Q&A are performing within the organization. Enhanced user analytics provides insights into search adoption across search applications like SharePoint, Microsoft Search for Bing, Microsoft Search for Windows, Microsoft365.com, and now also cover in-app searches from Outlook, Teams and other office applications.
